[[Image:Sar Mell Pin.png|thumb|right|200px|A map showing the location of Sar Mell on the continent of Essos.]]
'''Sar Mell''' is a ruined city in western [[Essos]], located on the eastern bank of the [[Rhoyne]] just north of its delta. The ruin is located north-west of [[Volantis]] and directly opposite the town of [[Volon Therys]]. The eastern banks of the Rhoyne lie at the far south-west of [[Dothraki]] influence.<ref>[http://viewers-guide.hbo.com/game-of-thrones/season2/#!/locations/volantis/ HBO viewers guide, season 2 map, Volantis entry]</ref>
sections.In the books: In the ''[[A Song of Ice and Fire]]'' novels, Sar Mell is a ruin. It is unclear if the city was once a [[Rhoynar]] settlement destroyed during the [[Valyria]]n invasion, or a more recent town wiped out by the [[Dothraki]].
